duties_responsibilities.duty: Help drive forecast, budget and long-range planning processes, reporting and analysis.
Maintain and continuously improve FP&A’s forecasting and reporting tool, Adaptive Insights (training will be provided).
Help improve processes and data automation.
Support G&A functions with purchases requisition, headcount and expense management, ensuring alignment with key company objectives.
Construct analysis and presentations that condense complex topics into actionable information that is communicated effectively to the stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
